# width

**Instance Property**

The width of the item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var width: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

If this property value is positive, the width of the combined image and title are fixed. If the value is `0.0` or negative, the item sets the width of the combined image and title to fit. This property is ignored if the style uses radio mode. The default value is `0.0`.

## Customizing item appearance

- **style**: The style of the item.
- **UIBarButtonItem.Style**: Constants that specify the style of an item.
- **tintColor**: The tint color to apply to the button item.
- **isHidden**: A Boolean that determines the visibility of the item.
- **isSelected**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the button is in a selected state.
- **possibleTitles**: The set of possible titles to display on the bar button.
